Articles.Content:
Then question marks wouldn't be at the end of questions.

What if they weren't...

> 
> Then question marks wouldn't be at the end of questions.
> What if they weren't...

They would take over Earth and start using NASA for their own intentions.
What if we were Kerbals?!

I'll be Gene Kerman to prevent death by crash.

What if kerbals were humans?

Then Kerbals wouldn't exist.

What if the Saturn V was never built?

Then I would be sad.

What if this sentance wasn't self-referential?

Then it would be just another "What if?"

What if we are Human Space Program and the Kerbals are controlling us?

Then the Kerbals are ILLUMINATI.

What if New Horizons skimmed my short hair?

Nothing new ... that's old ... no one ever told you yet that's all ...

What if all "internet forum owner" around the web give 1$/Ã‚Â£/Ã¢â€šÂ¬/Ã‚Â¤Ã‚Â¤Ã‚Â¤ to greece in memory of "Agora" birthdate ...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-18T10:49:05Z" title="07/18/2015 10:49  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 18, 2015</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
  
(if any one has the said count of "forum"s around the internet i m curious btw , might be fun)

Then whoever receives that will have a few bucks ^^

What if automobiles were manufactured by women?

Then they wouldn't be used by men. Because bias.

What if KSP was, instead, Kerbal Mining Corporation?

Then when Jeb's impulses kicked in and he built a rocket to fly underground, it crashed and killed him. No more Jeb, KMC gets valuable minerals, and they can never do rockets again.

What if the cake was not a lie, and 42 was?

The mice still wouldn't be convinced.

What if we were only the third most intelligent species on Earth?

Then it would be the Planet of the Pumpkins

What if half of The US stopped existing?

> 
> Then it would be the Planet of the Pumpkins
> What if half of The US stopped existing?

It would make a great XKCD, for one, and would probably result in a massive amount of displaced water.

What if suddenly, the whole world banned chocolate?

World War III. I am not kidding. 

What if the Shuttle was truly economical?

It would still be around today.

What if fi tahW

then whaf it

What if the mongol horde horded mongol boards when the mongol horde got board.

Was it a car or a cat I saw?

What if I never liked pizza?

then you won't like starbound xDr and pineapple ; )

what if i need a few /flap on the head xDr

Then you would have it.

What if Pink Floyd made only bad music?

Well, I dunno.

What if we tried *more* power?

Stuff would happen.

What if the USA had used the Metric System all along?

there would be no challenger disaster

what if kerbals were real and had a base on our moon?

We would no longer have a moon.

What if we used pine ( Christmas ) trees as rocket fuel?

There goes the Spirit of Christmas.

No, actually, that's the name of the probe said pine-fueled launcher has hefted to the stars above.

What if The Boss was not killed by Big Boss?
